  "description": "Tonatierra Community Development Institute at EverKrisp Farms offers a Pop-Up/Mobile Resource service. They accept walk-ins, provide curbside pickup/drive-through service, outdoor service, and pre-packed boxes/bags. They also offer dairy, eggs, fruits & vegetables, household products, meat, pet food/supplies, shelf-stable/non-perishable goods, and toiletries/hygiene products.",
